About 437 D St Unit 6C

This loft delivers an authentic loft vibe with 11' ceilings, dramatic mushroom columns, polished concrete floors, potential for a 2nd bedroom, 7 oversized windows offering great light & views of the Seaport/Boston and garage parking! The1-bed layout features 1244 SF of open living/dining area complete with custom kitchen with ceasar stone counters, breakfast bar, gas range, pot filler, wine fridge, under counter lighting, Electrolux appliances & glass tile backsplash. The spacious bedroom features glass transom window & custom sliding barn door for privacy. Additional features include spa quality bath with floating vanity & large glass enclosed shower with body sprays, common roof deck with city views, full sized W/D, A/C, great storage, elevator, low condo fees & garage parking. Easy access to the Seaport waterfront for dining, shopping, recreation, convention center, the Lawn on D & the financial district. Professionally managed & pet friendly.
